column1: thalion is a word glossed as "strong

column2: Noldorin thalion derives from Primitive Quendian stalgondō

column1: * Húrin son of Galdor (Lord of Dor-lómin)
column2: the last Lord of Dor-lómin was called Thalion
column3: "The Steadfast" for his unbending will against the tortures of Morgoth.

column2: the first Ruling Steward of Gondor was called "The Steadfast" for preventing civil war by taking up the rulership of Gondor.
